entity.name: Updates on Covid-19 in Ireland
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Taoiseach and Tánaiste, the Minister for Health and other ministers, the Department of Health, the HSE and public health authorities across the Republic of Ireland. For more, visit: https://twitter.com/HSELive

text: Today the @UN Flag flies on O’Connell Street in Dublin to mark Easter Sunday. This is a symbolic gesture to show Ireland's solidarity with the United Nations and the countries of the world fighting Covid-19 # flattenthecurve https://t.co/NGxfHEIPIC
